body:
Comment 9: 
Tarmigan,

I can reproduce your crash. I still believe, it is memory corruption by your program.
But I looked at your code and can't put finger on it. So, I wrote my own version. You
can try it at your own risk. There are many things still missing for a full serial port
support. Just patch current go tree with serial.diff attached and rebuild. Then you
should be able to compile main.go, which is sligtly modified version of yours. I have no
plans to submit serial port support for inclusion into Go, I doubt there is anyone else
but you and me who might find it usefull.

Alex
Attachments: 1. main.go (1920 bytes) 1. serial.diff (17338 bytes)
